greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence of run lengths in first differences of A080900.
comment: Even after 400000 terms there is no clear pattern here.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..102526
program: A080905list(up_to_n) = { my(xs=Map(), v, d, ds=vector(up_to_n)); mapput(xs,1,1); v = 1; for(n=2,1+up_to_n, v += (d=if(mapisdefined(xs,n), -2, +5)); mapput(xs,v,n); ds[n-1] = d); my(runlens=List([]), rl=1); for(i=2,#ds,if(ds[i]==ds[i-1],rl++, listput(runlens,rl);rl=1)); Vec(runlens); };
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 01 2003
